name: Noilla
description:
Noilla (pronounced noia) aims to be a model that specializes in generating high-quality anime-style images.

Usage

To use this model, simply add danbooru tags in the prompt.

Model

This model is merged from Grapefruit, Counterfeit-V2.5, and AnythingV5 (Pastel-Mix pre-3.0).

FAQ

  • Where are the older versions of the model?
    I won't release them because they're NSFW, I might release noilla-legacy.

modelVersions.name: v3.0
modelVersions.description: This version of the model is merged from Counterfeit v2.5, Grapefruit, and AnythingV5 models.
